                    ground truth (head)            [2.4890 0.4091 0.3825]
                    ground truth (head flipped)    [2.4890 -0.4091 -0.3825]
                    euclidean error (neck)         [0.032794]
                    euclidean error (head)         [1.289608]
                    euclidean error (head flipped) [0.240024]
